sen.j: 日本猫（にほんねこ）は、日本人に長く親しまれている日本特有のネコ。
sen.e: Japanese cats (nihon neko) are cats native to Japan which have long enjoyed the companionship with the Japanese.
Japanese cats (nihon neko) are cats native to Japan which have long enjoyed the companionship with the Japanese.
Japanese cats (nihon neko) are cats native to Japan which have long enjoyed the companionship with the Japanese.

sen.j: 顔は鼻筋が通り、耳の毛は短い。
sen.e: The face has a straight nose and the fur of the ears is short.
The face has a straight nose and the fur of the ears is short.
The face has a straight nose and the fur of the ears is short.

sen.j: 全身の毛はそれほど長くない。
sen.e: The fur of the whole body is not so long.
The fur of the whole body is not so long.
The fur of the whole body is not so long.

sen.j: 尾は細長いものと極端に短いものがあるが、細長くても先だけが折れ曲がっているものもある。
sen.e: Some tails are slender and others extremely short, but there are also some slender but curved only at the tip.
Some tails are slender and others extremely short, but there are also some slender but curved only at the tip.
Some tails are slender and others extremely short, but there are also some slender but curved only at the tip.

sen.j: 尾の短いものは尾骨が複雑に折れ曲がっていることが多いが、毛に覆われているために、外見上は単純な切り株状に見える。
sen.e: In many cases a short-tailed cat has a complicatedly-curved tailbone, but as it is covered with fur it looks like a mere stump on the face of it.
In many cases a short-tailed cat has a complicatedly-curved tailbone, but as it is covered with fur it looks like a mere stump on the face of it.
In many cases a short-tailed cat has a complicatedly-curved tailbone, but as it is covered with fur it looks like a mere stump on the face of it.

sen.j: 短尾のネコは、世界的には比較的珍しく、日本猫の特徴の1つとなっている。
sen.e: A short-tailed cat is relatively rare in the world, which forms one of the characteristics of the Japanese cats.
A short-tailed cat is relatively rare in the world, which forms one of the characteristics of the Japanese cats.
A short-tailed cat is relatively rare in the world, which forms one of the characteristics of the Japanese cats.

sen.j: 一説に、尾は東へ行くほど細長く、関西では短く、西へ行くと折れ曲がっているらしい。
sen.e: One theory says that the tail is likely to become longer and narrower as going farther toward east, short in Kansai (regions including Kyoto, Osaka and Kobe) and curved in western regions.
One theory says that the tail is likely to become longer and narrower as going farther toward east, short in Kansai (regions including Kyoto, Osaka and Kobe) and curved in western regions.
One theory says that the tail is likely to become longer and narrower as going farther toward east, short in Kansai (regions including Kyoto, Osaka and Kobe) and curved in western regions.

sen.j: 一説には二股に尾が分かれた妖怪猫又の誕生を忌み、尾の短い猫が好まれたため、尾の長い猫が減ったといわれる。
sen.e: According to another theory, long-tailed cats are said to have diminished because birth of a fork-tailed specter Nekomata (a mythical two-tailed monster cat) was shunned and short-tailed cats were preferred.

According to another theory, long-tailed cats are said to have diminished because birth of a fork-tailed specter Nekomata (a mythical two-tailed monster cat) was shunned and short-tailed cats were preferred.

According to another theory, long-tailed cats are said to have diminished because birth of a fork-tailed specter Nekomata (a mythical two-tailed monster cat) was shunned and short-tailed cats were preferred.

sen.j: 毛並みの美しさには定評があるが、またその色分けも外国人から珍しがられている。
sen.e: They have a reputation for their beautiful coats of fur and their classification by color is also regarded as novelty by foreigners.
They have a reputation for their beautiful coats of fur and their classification by color is also regarded as novelty by foreigners.
They have a reputation for their beautiful coats of fur and their classification by color is also regarded as novelty by foreigners.

sen.j: 白・黒の一色、濃淡帯状の縞模様、白地に黒ぶちや茶ぶち、そして三毛猫と呼ばれる白・茶・黒の三色に色分けされているものなどがいる。
sen.e: A single color of either white or black, a belt-shaped pattern of stripes with light and shade, black patches or brown patches on a white coat, and three colors of white, brown and black, called Mi-Ke (Calico) Cat, are examples classified by color.
sen.cmt: 日本の「三毛猫」は海外でも'Mi-Ke Cat'ともいうようです。 http://animal-world.com/Cats/Natural-Breeds/JapaneseBobtailCat.php
sen.e: A single color of either white or black, a belt-shaped pattern of stripes with light and shade, black patches or brown patches on a white coat, and three colors of white, brown and black, called Mike (Calico) Cat, are examples classified by color.
sen.cmt: Mi-Ke → Mike (表記指示書により）
sen.e: A single color of either white or black, a belt-shaped pattern of stripes with light and shade, black patches or brown patches on a white coat, and three colors of white, brown and black, called Mike (Calico) Cat, are examples classified by color.

sen.j: 縞模様のネコはトラネコと呼ばれ、茶縞のものをチャトラ、こげ茶縞のものをキジトラ、灰色縞のものをサバトラと特に分けて呼ぶ場合もある。
sen.e: A cat with a pattern of stripes is referred to as Tabby Cat, and sometimes called specifically in different terms; one with brown stripes is Red Tabby or Orange Tabby, one with dark brown stripes is Brown Tabby, and one with grey stripes is Grey Tabby.
sen.cmt: http://yaplog.jp/soul-monkey/archive/772ここでは「茶トラ」はorange tabby とあります。この欄の英語名につきましては、下欄の「種類」の記述と合わせました。http://detail.chiebukuro.yahoo.co.jp/qa/question_detail/q1424084899このサイトによれば、「茶トラ」はred tabbyというようです。 またOxford Dictionary of Englishで 'red tabby'をみますと、'a cat with a reddish-organge coat'とありますので、一応両方とも書いておきました。
sen.e: A cat with a pattern of stripes is referred to as Tabby Cat, and sometimes called specifically in different terms; one with brown stripes is Red Tabby or Orange Tabby, one with dark brown stripes is Brown Tabby, and one with grey stripes is Grey Tabby.

A cat with a pattern of stripes is referred to as Tabby Cat, and sometimes called specifically in different terms; one with brown stripes is Red Tabby or Orange Tabby, one with dark brown stripes is Brown Tabby, and one with grey stripes is Grey Tabby.

sen.j: 毛の色は遺伝的要素や母体内での影響などが考えられているが、隔世遺伝なども起こるためか、必ずしも両親と同じ色が生まれるわけではない。
sen.e: The color of the coat is considered to be brought by genetic factors and some influence in the mother's body but sometimes atavism and so on may occur, which do not always bring the same color as the parents.

The color of the coat is considered to be brought by genetic factors and some influence in the mother's body but sometimes atavism and so on may occur, which do not always bring the same color as the parents.

The color of the coat is considered to be brought by genetic factors and some influence in the mother's body but sometimes atavism and so on may occur, which do not always bring the same color as the parents.

sen.j: 伴性遺伝の関係で、白い面積の多いネコはメスが多く白以外の色のネコはオスが多い。
sen.e: In relation to sex-linked inheritance, many of the cats with larger area of a white coat are females and those with colors other than white are males.
In relation to sex-linked inheritance, many of the cats with larger area of a white coat are females and those with colors other than white are males.
In relation to sex-linked inheritance, many of the cats with larger area of a white coat are females and those with colors other than white are males.

sen.j: また三毛猫はほぼ全てがメスである。
sen.e: Besides, almost all Mi-Ke Cats are females.
Besides, almost all Mike Cats are females.
sen.cmt: Mi-Ke → Mike (表記指示書により）
sen.e: Besides, almost all Mike Cats are females.

sen.j: 1万年ほど昔から大陸から切り離された列島であった日本には、元来ネコ（イエネコ）が存在していなかった。
sen.e: In Japan which was an island separated from the continent since about ten thousand years ago, cats (domestic cats) originally did not exist.
In Japan which was an island separated from the continent since about ten thousand years ago, cats (domestic cats) originally did not exist.
In Japan which was an island separated from the continent since about ten thousand years ago, cats (domestic cats) originally did not exist.

sen.j: 奈良時代ごろに、経典などの大事な書物をネズミから守る益獣として、中国の歴史から輸入された事が、日本猫の始まりと言う伝説があるが、弥生時代のカラカミ遺跡からの発見例もあり、紀元前から存在していた可能性がある。
sen.e: There is a legend that it was the beginning of Japanese cats that they were imported around the Nara period from Chinese history as beneficial cats to protect important documents including sutras from rats, but there is a possibility that they had existed since before the birth of Christ partially because there is a specimen discovered from the Karakami remains of the Yayoi period (250 B.C.– 250 A.D.).
sen.cmt: 「中国の歴史から輸入された事が」とありますが、この文章では「中国から輸入された」となるのが正しいように思います。そのあとに「歴史的な伝説があるが」と続くならわかりますが。 「弥生時代」の説明を括弧で付け加えました。
sen.e: There is a legend that the beginning of Japanese cats was the ones imported around the Nara period from Chinese history as beneficial cats to protect important documents including sutras from rats, but there is a possibility that they had existed since before the birth of Christ partially because there is a specimen discovered from the Karakami remains of the Yayoi period (250 B.C.– 250 A.D.).
sen.cmt: it was the beginning of Japanese cats that they were imported→ the beginning of Japanese cats was the ones importedに変更しました（文法）
sen.e: There is a legend that the beginning of Japanese cats was the ones imported around the Nara period from Chinese history as beneficial cats to protect important documents including sutras from rats, but there is a possibility that they had existed since before the birth of Christ partially because there is a specimen discovered from the Karakami remains of the Yayoi period (250 B.C.– 250 A.D.).

sen.j: 平安時代にはさまざまな和歌や物語に登場し、人々に親しまれていたことが窺われる。
sen.e: In the Heian period they appeared in various waka (Japanese poems) and narratives, which implies that they were good friends of people.
In the Heian period they appeared in various waka (Japanese poems) and narratives, which implies that they were good friends of people.
In the Heian period they appeared in various waka (Japanese poems) and narratives, which implies that they were good friends of people.

sen.j: その後も、中国と交易するたびにネコが日本を訪れたため、いくらかの変遷があったと思われるが、戦国時代 (日本)にシャム（タイ王国）などの東南アジアとも交易したことから、これらのネコとも関係ができたと思われる。
sen.e: As cats visited Japan after that also on each occasion of trades with China, there seemed to be some changes, but judging from the fact that there were also some trades with Southeast Asia including Siam (Kingdom of Thailand) during the Sengoku Period (Period of Warring States) (Japan), it is considered to have another relation with the cats of these areas.

As cats were brought into Japan on each occasion of trades with China, there seemed to be some changes, but judging from the fact that there were also some trades with Southeast Asia including Siam (Kingdom of Thailand) during the Sengoku Period (Period of Warring States) (Japan), it is considered to have another relation with the cats of these areas.
sen.cmt: 直訳のcat visited Japanは不自然なので、cats were brought into Japanにしました
sen.e: As cats were brought into Japan on each occasion of trades with China, there seemed to be some changes, but judging from the fact that there were also some trades with Southeast Asia including Siam (Kingdom of Thailand) during the Sengoku Period (Period of Warring States) (Japan), it is considered to have another relation with the cats of these areas.

sen.j: 現在の日本猫の形は江戸時代に固定されたものである。
sen.e: The present shape of the Japanese cats is one established in the Edo period.
The present shape of the Japanese cats is one established in the Edo period.
The present shape of the Japanese cats is one established in the Edo period.

sen.j: 日光東照宮の「眠り猫」（伝・左甚五郎作）は、日本猫の姿をよくあらわす好例といえよう。
sen.e: A wooden prayer board of 'Sleeping Cat' (attributed: carved by Jingoro HIDARI) of Nikko Tosho-gu Shrine is a good example to show what Japanese cats were like.
A wooden prayer board of 'Sleeping Cat' (attributed: carved by Jingoro HIDARI) of Nikko Tosho-gu Shrine is a good example to show what Japanese cats were like.
A wooden prayer board of 'Sleeping Cat' (attributed: carved by Jingoro HIDARI) of Nikko Tosho-gu Shrine is a good example to show what Japanese cats were like.

sen.j: 日本に輸入されて以来、愛玩用というよりも益獣として用いられたため、家で飼われるより、外で暮らすことが多かった。
sen.e: Since they were imported to Japan they were used as beneficial animals rather than pets, so they more often spent outside than were kept inside houses.
Since they were imported to Japan they were used as beneficial animals rather than pets, so they more often spent outside than were kept inside houses.
Since they were imported to Japan they were used as beneficial animals rather than pets, so they more often spent outside than were kept inside houses.

sen.j: そのため、人工的に品種改良されることもなかった。
sen.e: Therefore, they had never selective breeding artificially.
Therefore, they had never selective breeding artificially.
Therefore, they had never selective breeding artificially.

sen.j: ネズミを駆除するので、市民からも嫌がられることもなく、野良猫として全国に広がった。
sen.e: As they get rid of rats, they spread as alley cats throughout the country without being hated by citizens.
As they get rid of rats, they spread as alley cats throughout the country without being hated by citizens.
As they get rid of rats, they spread as alley cats throughout the country without being hated by citizens.

sen.e: Blue eyes and Kinme Ginme (literally, a golden eye and a silver eye) (odd-eyed [cat]) in which the color of the right eye and the left eye is different are sometimes seen.

sen.j: ブチネコ
sen.e: Patched Tabby
sen.cmt: 研究社『新英和大辞典』第五版でtabby catを調べますと、‘ぶち猫、とら猫’とあります。このうち縞状にぶちがあるものを「トラネコ」ぶちが並んでいないものを「ブチネコ」と呼ぶようです。そこで訳語としては前者をtabby cat、後者をpatched tabby としました。これにはspotted tabbyという言い方もありますが、「ぶち」という雰囲気を出すにはpatchedの方が合うように思いこちらを使いました。Http://fanciers.com/other-faqs/colors.html

sen.j: 明治時代以降、文明開化と共にやって来た西洋種がもてはやされ、戸外で飼われ自然に交雑するネコの特性とも相まって、これらのネコと日本猫の交配が進んだ結果、雑種が増えた。
sen.e: After the Meiji period Western breeds that came with civilization and enlightenment became popular, and combined with peculiarity of cats that were kept outside and naturally crossbred, as a result of development of mating between these cats and Japanese cats, hybrids increased.

After the Meiji period Western breeds that came with civilization and enlightenment became popular, and combined with peculiarity of cats that were kept outside and naturally crossbred as well as development of mating between these cats and Japanese cats caused hybrids to increase.
sen.cmt: and combined with peculiarity of cats that were kept outside and naturally crossbred, as a result of development of mating自然ではないので修正しました
sen.e: After the Meiji period Western breeds that came with civilization and enlightenment became popular, and combined with peculiarity of cats that were kept outside and naturally crossbred as well as development of mating between these cats and Japanese cats caused hybrids to increase.

sen.j: この傾向が最も激しく起こったのは太平洋戦争後で、一般市民が手軽にペットを飼う（買う）ことができるようになり、外来種が多く日本で飼われるようになった。
sen.e: It was after the Pacific War that this trend occurred most eminently, when ordinary citizens were allowed to keep (buy) pets easily and many exotic breeds came to be kept in Japan.
It was after the Pacific War that this trend occurred most eminently, when ordinary citizens were allowed to keep (buy) pets easily and many exotic breeds came to be kept in Japan.
It was after the Pacific War that this trend occurred most eminently, when ordinary citizens were allowed to keep (buy) pets easily and many exotic breeds came to be kept in Japan.

sen.j: 猫の習性に合わせて外を出歩かせれば野良猫と交配し、雑種が生まれた。
sen.e: Walking cats to follow their habits, they mated with alley cats and hybrids were born.
Cats which were allowed to walk around outside according to their habits mated with alley cats and hybrids were born.
sen.cmt: Walking cats to follow～の意味がわかりにくいため修正しました
sen.e: Cats which were allowed to walk around outside according to their habits mated with alley cats and hybrids were born.

sen.j: 日本猫は野良猫として日本人と密接に関わっていたため、日本猫が『種』として認識されにくかったことが背景として考えられる。
sen.e: Since Japanese cats had close contact with the Japanese as alley cats, it is considered as a background that they were difficult to be recognized as "a breed".
Since Japanese cats had close contact with the Japanese as alley cats, it is considered as a background that they were difficult to be recognized as "a breed".
Since Japanese cats had close contact with the Japanese as alley cats, it is considered as a background that they were difficult to be recognized as "a breed".

sen.j: また、外来種も野良猫化し、雑種が進んだ。
sen.e: Besides, exotic breeds also turned to alley cats and further hybridity progressed.
sen.cmt: 「雑種が進んだ」という日本語がわかりにくく、「雑種性が進んだ」という意味にとりました。
sen.e: Besides, exotic breeds also turned to alley cats and further hybridity progressed.
Besides, exotic breeds also turned to alley cats and further hybridity progressed.

sen.j: そのため、江戸時代以来の日本猫の姿は確実に失われている。
sen.e: Therefore, the original figure of the Japanese cats since the Edo period has been disappearing for certain.
Therefore, the original figure of the Japanese cats since the Edo period has been disappearing for certain.
Therefore, the original figure of the Japanese cats since the Edo period has been disappearing for certain.

sen.j: 現在の野良猫は、上記のような状況で、都市部や住宅街では、そのほとんどが雑種となってしまった。
sen.e: Present alley cats, under above-mentioned circumstances, in urban areas and residential neighborhood, have mostly become hybrids.
Present alley cats, under above-mentioned circumstances, in urban areas and residential neighborhood, have mostly become hybrids.
Present alley cats, under above-mentioned circumstances, in urban areas and residential neighborhood, have mostly become hybrids.

sen.j: 本来の日本猫は、外来種の影響の少ない地方の野良猫や、一部の愛猫家によって飼育されているだけである。
sen.e: Original Japanese cats have survived as alley cats which live in countryside less influenced by exotic breeds, or as pets kept by some cat lovers.
sen.cmt: この日本語の文章が完成していないので、surviveという動詞を使って補いました。その関連で最後の方に、survive as petsという語を入れました。つまり「野良犬として、またはペットとして残っている」という形です。
sen.e: Original Japanese cats have survived as alley cats which live in countryside less influenced by exotic breeds, or as pets kept by some cat lovers.
Original Japanese cats have survived as alley cats which live in countryside less influenced by exotic breeds, or as pets kept by some cat lovers.

sen.j: また、アメリカやヨーロッパでは、尾の短い日本猫を原種としてアメリカで改良・固定されたジャパニーズボブテイルという品種が、愛猫家の間で密かな流行を呼んでいる。
sen.e: And in America and Europe, a breed of the Japanese bob-tailed cat which was improved and established in America as a pure strain from the bob-tailed Japanese cat is gaining quiet popularity among cat lovers.

And in America and Europe, a breed of the Japanese bob-tailed cat which was improved and established in America as a pure strain from the bob-tailed Japanese cat is gaining quiet popularity among cat lovers.

And in America and Europe, a breed of the Japanese bob-tailed cat which was improved and established in America as a pure strain from the bob-tailed Japanese cat is gaining quiet popularity among cat lovers.

sen.j: 逆に日本猫が持ち出された例として、ネコの存在しなかった沖縄や奄美大島などに人々が本土から移住した際に、一緒に猫を連れて行ったため、この地でノネコとなったものが、ヤンバルクイナなど固有の希少動物を食い荒らし、問題となっている。
sen.e: On the contrary as for an example in which Japanese cats were brought out, when people moved out from the main land to Okinawa or Amami-oshima island where cats had not existed, people carried cats with them, and as a result, some of them that became alley cats there spoilt rare native wildlife including Okinawa rails by eating them, which has been at issue.

On the contrary, an example of Japanese cats being brought out includes that, when people moved from the main land to Okinawa or Amami-oshima island where cats had not existed, they took cats with them, and as a result, some of them became alley cats there and spoilt rare native wildlife including Okinawa rails by eating them, which has been at issue.
sen.cmt: as for an example → an example ～ includes thatsome of them that became → some of them became に変更しました（自然な表現のため）
sen.e: On the contrary, an example of Japanese cats being brought out includes that, when people moved from the main land to Okinawa or Amami-oshima island where cats had not existed, they took cats with them, and as a result, some of them became alley cats there and spoilt rare native wildlife including Okinawa rails by eating them, which has been at issue.
